column2:
"<%me>?
What's with that expression? Has something happened?"
"You should try and cheer up. Things won't seem so bad if you face them with a smile!"
"Ulc... This might not be the best time for that."
"Hm, you're pulling the same face. Okay, this is starting to get scary. What's going on?"

"The thing is... This new enemy is the [Profound Darkness].
And its host is... Matoi."

"But <%me>'s on the case,
so it'll all work out in the end, right?"
"After all, you've done so much to help me and Theo. I know you won't let Matoi down either."
"And this time, all of ARKS is behind you. Frankly, I'd be shocked if you failed."
"...You're amazing. I don't know how you always manage to stay so positive."
"Well, it's all I can do, so it's what I'm going to do."
"I want to be the one who greets people with a smile when they get back after a hard day's work. I think that's the best way I can explain it."
"Actually, maybe there is something else I can do..."
"That's it! When the battle's over and everyone's come back safely, we'll get the whole of ARKS together for a huge party!"
"Would it be a welcome home party? Or maybe a victory celebration? Whatever, we'll figure out what to call it later, all that matters is that people have fun."
"I'm counting on you to make sure everyone comes back in one piece, OK? I don't want a single person missing!"
